ingredients: 1   +   1/2 cups all-purpose flour,   +   1/4 cup white sugar, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 pinch salt, 3  eggs,   +   1/4 cup heavy whipping cream,   +   1/4 cup unsalted butter, melted, 3 cups mango - peeled, seeded, and cubed
nutrition: Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 4g 20%, Cholesterol 64mg 21%, Sodium 102mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 24g 9%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 10g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 12mg 58%, Calcium 63mg 5%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 103mg 2%
